prompts: Create a plant-based Pokemon that resembles a bell with vibrant colors and a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that can camouflage itself in the forest using its green and yellow hues.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon that has a mouth resembling a flower and can spit out toxins.
Show me a cute, bell-shaped creature with a big smile and a sunny disposition.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, featuring a unique blend of yellow and brown colors.
Give me a character that embodies both poison and plant types, with a distinctive bell shape.
Make a Pokemon that is small, quirky, and loves to hang out in sunny meadows.
